A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn’t really like this movie when I first left the theater but I watched some reviews on YouTube explaining the ending and some key points. I instantly enjoyed it after some of it was explained. Was it the best Star Wars movie ever? No. Was it exciting\, fun\, and worth seeing??? Yes!!! It went against all the traditional Star Wars movies and made a new path for the Force to live on forever!!!!
